response.original_title: Gong fu zhi wang meng hu shang shan
response.overview: Overnight, the master of the Humen Martial Arts School was brutally murdered, and the young master Lele was also pursued by a mysterious figure. In order to avenge his father and investigate the truth behind the matter, Lele and his companions resolutely embarked on the journey to Kung Fu Mountain. Will the road ahead be smooth and smooth?  In order to prevent Lele, the Holy Martial Arts Hall sent various experts one after another to block it. What is the future of Lele?
response.title: Kung Fu Wang: Meng Hu Shangshan
